title: Necklace With Cameos Of Theatrical Masks, ca. 1880–1900
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Susan Dwight Bliss, Annie Schermerhorn Kane, and various donors
description: Oval black enamel plaques, each with one carved emerald mask and one pearl drop and pearl studded piece separating each plaque.

type.name: Necklace with cameos of theatrical masks

tombstone.epitaph:
Necklace With Cameos Of Theatrical Masks, ca. 1880–1900.
ca. 1880–1900. Gold, enamel, emeralds, pearls. Museum purchase through gift of Susan Dwight Bliss, Annie Schermerhorn Kane, and various donors. 1969-40-16.
